name: THE iDOLM@STER: Shiny Festa Rhythmic Record
summary: An entry in the popular idol management series from Bandai Namco. Funky Note is the original PSP release from Japan, while Rhythmic Record is the worldwide version, with rhythm gameplay altered for iOS devices.

alternative_names.name: THE iDOLM@STER SHINY FESTA Funky Note
